name: illuminate
description: REST Services in support of the Buildit MI data tools

scripts.genConfig: echo '=> generating local config file' && gulp gen_config
scripts.lint: echo '=> linting' && eslint api_doc/ routes/ services/ test/ test_accept/ util/ *.js
scripts.package: echo '=> packaging for deployment' && gulp package
scripts.security: echo '=> nsp testing' && nsp check --output summary
scripts.test: echo '=> testing' && nyc mocha test -R spec
scripts.validate: echo '=> validating Illuminate' && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run security

author: buildit
